testcases.test: Use inherited-property-value() in expressions for font-size property, including using function with property other than font-size and using as part of a larger expression.
Testing from-table-column() with expressions that should fail because they are used on FOs that are not descendants of fo:table-cell.
Testing from-table-column() with a non-inherited property. This should fail.
Testing from-table-column(NCName) with a non-inherited property. This should fail.
Testing from-table-column(NCName) with bogus property name. This should fail.
Testing column-number="from-table-column()". This should fail.
Testing font-size="from-table-column(font-size)".
Testing font-size="from-table-column()" when no corresponding fo:table-column. This should fail.
Test start-indent percentage.
800pt "I" with overflow unspecified.
800pt "I" with overflow="visible".
800pt "I" with overflow="hidden".
800pt "I" with overflow="scroll".
800pt "I" with overflow="error-if-overflow".
800pt "I" with overflow="auto".
800pt "I" with overflow="inherit".
Testing external-graphic.
Two graphics should be formatted next to each other with no gap.
Two graphics should be formatted next to each other with no gap.
content-width as percentage and no specified content-height.
"xmlroff XSL formatter" image.
"xmlroff XSL formatter" image with transparent background in fo:external-graphic with yellow background.
Testing lists.
Testing lists.

Use text-align="center" with fo:block elements generating areas that fit within a page and that break across pages for both writing-mode="lr" and writing-mode="rl".

Demonstrate support for the 16 color keywords
Demonstrate support for the 'font-size' property.
Demonstrate catching the failure conditions for the 'font-size' property.
Demonstrate support for the 'font-stretch' property.
Demonstrate support for the 'font-weight' property. Note that most systems will not have every weight for the 'sans-serif' font.
Demonstrate support for the 'font-weight' property. Note that most systems will not have every weight for the '-serif' font.
Demonstrate support for the 'font-weight' property. Note that most systems will not have every weight for the 'monospace' font.
